definitions: a person who evaluates the quality of a person or thing

examples.text: the assessor interviews the candidates and observes them actually using the language

shortDefinitions: person who evaluates quality of person or thing

definitions: a person who calculates or estimates the price or value of something

examples.text: loss assessors were beginning to get an idea of the extent of the damage
the county tax assessor had reported separate valuations for the buildings and the land

shortDefinitions: person who calculates price or value of something

definitions: a person who is knowledgeable in a particular field and is called upon for advice, typically by a judge or committee of inquiry

examples.text: the expert assessor recommended that the applicant have sole custody

shortDefinitions: person who is knowledgeable in a particular field
